entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Ice pellets or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
